mapper.select: select * from mod_info where modName = #{jsonObj.modName} and userName = #{jsonObj.userName} limit 1
select count(*) from mod_camera where cameraIndex= #{cameraIndex}

select sum(t.jrls) jrls, sum(t.sxtsl) sxtsl,sum(t.sfmxsl) sfmxsl from ( select count(*) jrls,0 sxtsl,0 sfmxsl from algorithm union all select 0 jrls,count(*) sxtsl,0 sfmxsl from camera union all select 0 jrls,0 sxtsl,count(*) sfmxsl from algorithmacc) t limit 1

select sum(sxtsl) sxtsl,sum(kqsl) kqsl,sum(gbsl) gbsl,sum(fzr) fzr,sum(jrls) jrls,sum(yxzsl) yxzsl,sum(ycsl) ycsl,sum(bjs) bjs from ( select count(*) sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from camera union all select 0 sxtsl,count(*) kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from camera where state='运行中' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,count(*) gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from camera where state='关闭' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,count(*) fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,count(*) jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,count(*) yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm where state='运行中' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,count(*) ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm where state='异常' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,count(*) bjs from algorithmalarm) t limit 1
select FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%d') as days,count(id) as num from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY days ORDER BY days

select FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%d') as days,count(id) num from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY days ORDER BY days
select count(*) as total from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select algorithm_id,count(*) as num from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY algorithm_id

select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,sum(bjs) bjs,sum(qrs) qrs from ( select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,count(*) as bjs, 0 as qrs from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name union all select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,0 as bjs, count(*) asqrs from algorithmalarm where state='已确认' and FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ) t GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name

select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,sum(algorithm_num) algorithm_num from ( select id as algorithm_id,title as algorithm_name,0 algorithm_num from algorithmacc union all select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,count(*) algorithm_num from algorithmalarm where state='未确认' GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ) t GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ORDER BY algorithm_num desc
